amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Legal Services Corporation by $25 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the Legal Services Corporation by $25,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 185 (Roll no. 326).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Obey.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
